FuncDef: The display roam-character command displays the flag of the roaming user.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When the system parses the user account, it can cross out the home area information from the account name extension according to the roaming flag. The system can obtain the correct string of the domain name.
After setting the flag of the roaming user by using the roam-character command, you can check the configuration through the display roam-character command.
